es.ceu.alf.simeon

Interface ComparisonOntologyManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JenaComparisonOntologyManager

    public interface ComparisonOntologyManager
    Interface for managing an ontology that uses the SIMEON ontology. This is the main interface and every class that want to access an ontology build with the SIMEON ontology must implement it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.net.URI COMPARISONMEASURE_URI
      * The URI for the ComparisonMeasure class in the SIMEON ontology.
      static java.net.URI COMPARISONMETHOD_URI
      * The URI for the ComparisonMethod class in the SIMEON ontology.
      static java.net.URI HASSOURCEOBJECT_URI
      The URI for the hasSourceObject object property in the SIMEON ontology.
      static java.net.URI HASTARGETOBJECT_URI
      The URI for the hasTargetObject object property in the SIMEON ontology.
      static java.net.URI HASVALUE_URI
      The URI for the hasValue data property in the SIMEON ontology.
      static java.net.URI ISPERFORMEDBY_URI
      The URI for the isPerformedBy object property in the SIMEON ontology.
      static java.lang.String SIMEON_RDF_URL
      * The URI for the ComparisonMeasure class in the SIMEON ontology.
      static java.net.URI USESCOMPARISONMETHOD_URI
      The URI for the usesComparisonMethod object property in the SIMEON ontology.

      • getComparisonMeasure

        ComparisonMeasure getComparisonMeasure(java.net.URI uri)
        Gets a comparison measure with the given URI from the ontology.
        Parameters:
        uri - is the URI of the comparison measure.
        Returns:
        the comparison measure with the given URI.

      • addComparisonMeasure

        void addComparisonMeasure(ComparisonMeasure measure)
        Adds a new comparison measure to the ontology.
        Parameters:
        measure - is the comparison measure to add to the ontology.

      • writeOntology

        void writeOntology(java.lang.String file,
                   java.lang.String format)
        Serializes the ontology to a file.
        Parameters:
        file - is a string with the path to the file where to write the ontology.
        format - is the langue used for the seralization of the ontology ("RDF/XML", "TURTLE",...).

        Serializes the ontology to a file in RDF/XML language.
